attributes.action: Defend Sea Angling…. Tell them nothing!
attributes.additional_details: We the under signed would like to bring to the ministers attention that we will not participate in supplying the data requested in the Angling 2012 project. This will prove from the off that any results will be without credibility. Our action is a result of the intention to inform the European Union by the supply of data which is clearly intended to be used for future management. RSA is one of the few unregulated pass times that is both profitable and sustainable and in no need of government interference.
